The tweet from Minnesota Attorney Genera: Antifa: The Anti-Fascist Handbook" was shared by Deputy Director of Communications for the Trump 2020 Campaign Matt Wolking.
The tweet was shared on January 3: 2018, as proven by archived versions of the tweet.
The book: Antifa: The Anti-Fascist Handbook" was published a few months prior to the tweet and was written by Mark Bray, a former Occupy Wall Street activist and scholar of human rights and political radicalism.
